parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS security group. Each instance can be added to up to three security groups. Separate the security group IDs with commas (,). To delete an ECS security group for the instance, leave this parameter empty. You can call the DescribeSecurityGroups operation to query the ID of the ECS security group.
